Yeonhee

Korean: 연희

Birthday:
Feb 1, 1990
Age:
35 years old
Height:
5'4" (161 cm)
Group (2015-2016):
A-Plus

Introduction

Yeonhee (연희) is a South Korean singer. She is a former member of the girl groups A-Plus and OUIGEE as Yun-E (연이). She made her solo debut on March 4, 2014 with the Digital Single "My West".

Mar 4, 2014
